ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On that Day, woe to the deniers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Woe on that Day to those that give the lie to the Truth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Woe on that day to the rejecters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Woe to the deniers on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Woe on that Day to the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:34] Woe to the deniers on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Woe) severe punishment (unto the repudiators) of faith and the resurrection (on that day) the Day of Judgement!
